name: tasit-action
description: A library for using Ethereum smart contracts that abstracts away the low-level blockchain-related details so that developers can focus on the core business logic for their app
author: Tasit Labs

scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist/* && npx babel src --out-dir dist --ignore **/*.test.js && mkdir dist/abi && cp src/abi/* dist/abi/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npx mocha src/*.test.js --require @babel/register --require src/testHelpers/mochaSetup.js --no-timeouts
